body_html:
The best thing to do would probably be to interact with the camera via the original android.hardware.Camera if the supportedHardwareLevel or Android API level is too low.

If you or someone else would like to contribute that it would be very much appreciated. This might also resolve #7464.
body_text:
The best thing to do would probably be to interact with the camera via the original android.hardware.Camera if the supportedHardwareLevel or Android API level is too low.
If you or someone else would like to contribute that it would be very much appreciated. This might also resolve #7464.
body:
The best thing to do would probably be to interact with the camera via the original android.hardware.Camera if the supportedHardwareLevel or Android API level is too low.

If you or someone else would like to contribute that it would be very much appreciated. This might also resolve #7464.
